course.subject: CHEM
course.name: Chemistry for Advanced Materials
course.description: Chemistry of materials with nano-dimensional structures and advanced functionalities. Working principles of liquid-crystalline displays and organic light-emitting diodes. High-tech applications of luminescent materials in optoelectronic systems, chemical sensors and biological probes.
course.exclusions: CHEM 4220, NANO 5100

reviews.author: KristyLWK
reviews.comment_content: The content is easy to follow
reviews.comment_grading: I didn't get a very high marks in the mid term exam and assignment, like just slightly above the average but not the top one. Still, I get a A in the course.
reviews.comment_workload: The assignments were short and not that difficult. There is only one midterm exam but no final exam. For the final essay, we can choose the topic by ourselves as long as it related to materials. It is relatively easy that you can choose the topic you are familiar
